languages.text: {n}Женщина до бледноты сжимает в грубых руках оборки шикарного платья и поднимает на вас глаза.{/n} "Пожалуйста, Ваше Светлишество! Отпустите, Богом-Императором прошу! Никто из тех, кого в костюмы наряжают, домой не возвращается. И я не вернусь, если останусь. А я ведь ничего плохого не сделала!"

{n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина до бледноты сжимает в грубых руках оборки шикарного платья и поднимает на вас глаза.{/n} "Пожалуйста, Ваше Светлишество! Отпустите, Богом-Императором прошу! Никто из тех, кого в костюмы наряжают, домой не возвращается. И я не вернусь, если останусь. А я ведь ничего плохого не сделала!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With all her strength, the woman grips her fabulous dress with her rough hands and looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets dressed in these costumes ever returns home. I won't return if I stay, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

Nobody who gets dressed in these costumes ever returns home. I won't return if I stay, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

languages.text: {n}年轻女人用粗糙的双手抓着漂亮裙子的褶边，握得关节都发白了。她抬起头，看着你。{/n}“求您了，大人！以神皇之名，求求您，让我走吧！所有穿上这种衣服的人，都再也回不去了。我只知道，要是留在这里，我就再也回不了家了。我什么坏事都没做过！”
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻女人用粗糙的双手抓着漂亮裙子的褶边，握得关节都发白了。她抬起头，看着你。{/n}“求您了，大人！以神皇之名，求求您，让我走吧！所有穿上这种衣服的人，都再也回不去了。我只知道，要是留在这里，我就再也回不了家了。我什么坏事都没做过！”

languages.text: {n}豪華なドレスのフリルを、節くれだった白くこわばった手でぎゅっと握りしめながら、女性はあなたを見上げた。{/n}「お願い、ありがたき方！神帝陛下にかけて、どうか帰らせてください！こんな格好をさせられた人は、誰一人として戻ってきたことがないんだ。ここにいたら、もう二度と家には帰れない…そんな気がする。私は何も悪いことなんてしてないんだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}豪華なドレスのフリルを、節くれだった白くこわばった手でぎゅっと握りしめながら、女性はあなたを見上げた。{/n}「お願い、ありがたき方！神帝陛下にかけて、どうか帰らせてください！こんな格好をさせられた人は、誰一人として戻ってきたことがないんだ。ここにいたら、もう二度と家には帰れない…そんな気がする。私は何も悪いことなんてしてないんだ！」

languages.text: {n}Con los nudillos blancos de apretar los volantes de su fabuloso vestido, la mujer levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¡Por favor, Excelencia! ¡Por el Dios Emperador, deje que me vaya! Nadie regresa jamás de estas mascaradas. Si me quedo, sé bien que no volveré a ver a mi familia. ¡No he hecho nada malo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con los nudillos blancos de apretar los volantes de su fabuloso vestido, la mujer levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¡Por favor, Excelencia! ¡Por el Dios Emperador, deje que me vaya! Nadie regresa jamás de estas mascaradas. Si me quedo, sé bien que no volveré a ver a mi familia. ¡No he hecho nada malo!».

languages.text: {n}Göz alıcı elbisesinin fırfırlarını nasırlı, eklemleri beyazlaşmış elleriyle sımsıkı tutan kadın, gözlerinin içine bakıyor. {/n}"Aman, {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Tanrı İmparator aşkına, bırakın da gideyim! Bu elbiseyle gönderilip de geri dönen daha olmadı. Kalırsam evime dönemem, adım gibi eminim. Bir yanlışım olmadı ki!"
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Göz alıcı elbisesinin fırfırlarını nasırlı, eklemleri beyazlaşmış elleriyle sımsıkı tutan kadın, gözlerinin içine bakıyor. {/n}"Aman, {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Tanrı İmparator aşkına, bırakın da gideyim! Bu elbiseyle gönderilip de geri dönen daha olmadı. Kalırsam evime dönemem, adım gibi eminim. Bir yanlışım olmadı ki!"

languages.text: {n}Agrippant fermement les volants de sa splendide robe de ses mains rêches, la femme lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Pitié, Votre Gracieuseté ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, laissez-moi partir ! Aucun de ceux qui passent ces tenues ne revient jamais. Si je reste, je ne reverrai plus les miens, je le sais. Je n'ai rien fait mal ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Agrippant fermement les volants de sa splendide robe de ses mains rêches, la femme lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Pitié, Votre Gracieuseté ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, laissez-moi partir ! Aucun de ceux qui passent ces tenues ne revient jamais. Si je reste, je ne reverrai plus les miens, je le sais. Je n'ai rien fait mal ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Frau umklammert nervös die Rüschen ihres prächtigen Kleids mit ihren rauen Händen und blickt zu dir auf.{/n} "Bitte, Euer Gnaden! Beim Gottimperator, lasst mich einfach gehen! Niemand, der in so eine Aufmachung gesteckt wird, kehrt jemals zurück. Wenn ich bleibe, sehe ich mein Zuhause nie wieder, das weiß ich. Ich habe nichts Unrechtes getan!"
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the frills of her fabulous dress in her coarse, white-knuckled hands, the woman looks up at you.{/n} "Please, Your Graciousness! By the God-Emperor, just let me leave! Nobody who gets put in one of these get-ups ever comes back. If I stay, I won't see my home again, I just know it. I haven't done anything wrong!"
